import React, { useState } from 'react' import "./layoutPopup.scss" export const LayoutPopup = ({ layoutOptions,optionSelected, setOptionSelected, count, setPopup, setSubmit }) => { const [error,setError]=useState(false) return (
{ layoutOptions ? <>

Click ok to contine

{ optionSelected===""&&

Please select any option

} : <>

Seating Count : {count}

Click ok to contine

}
) }
